alert.note: Alert for South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 21 at 2:05AM MST until January 22 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower to middle 30s expected. * WHERE...South Mountain/Ahwatukee. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Saturday. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight Saturday night to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Temperatures cold enough to damage sensitive crops and landscaping plants and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
